t: Green Day - Revolution Radio - Amazon.com Music
Green Day - Nimrod - Amazon.com Music
s: The DJ said that it was off of their brand new album, so I stopped at a record store and picked up both Nimrod and Warning right then and there. Anyway, the short version is: I really wish I'd bought Nimrod back in 1997. It's already my 2nd favorite Green Day album, just behind 39/Smooth. (Unfortunately I think Warning is probably their weakest album so far, though it does have a few very good songs on it.) ... The cd ...

t: Green Day - Studio Albums 1990 - 2009 - Amazon.com Music
s: I've over played my old CD's and needed to renew my Green Day collection. Still a fan and they still sound great. And I got 8 albums for like 50 bucks.

t: Green Day - Greatest Hits: God's Favorite Band - Amazon.com Music
s: Been getting back into Vinyl, and ... on CD, I wanted to start by purchasing this one on Vinyl. Sounds great. It really is a great album to own if you're just looking for their biggest hits. Although, I can see a more avid fan wouldn't be satisfied with only this since so many of their albums have great songs beyond the hits. Still, this is a perfect "Greatest Hits" compilation from Green Day. Pick it up on any format if you're ...

t: Green Day - Kerplunk! - Amazon.com Music
s: The reissue of Kerplunk on vinyl is a great pressing. Plus you get a bonus 7" Sweet Children EP inside. So you will have all the tracks that make up the CD. I'm not really in to Green Day, but Kerplunk is an excellent album.
